thread.section_title: Hotel des Arts - Montmartre - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Room and Great Neighborhood
thread.title_full: Great Room and Great Neighborhood - Review of Hotel des Arts - Montmartre, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: joserchapa
title: Great Room and Great Neighborhood
text: The room and the hotel itself complemented the beautiful neighborhood of Montmartre. Next time I visit Paris, I will surely stay at this hotel. Close to multiple shops, restaurants, and sights complemented by a wonderful staff and comfortable room.
